title: Models package exports
description: Update `app/models/__init__.py` to re-export all models and enums. This is required for Alembic autogenerate to discover all models. Import and re-export: Base, User, RefreshToken, UserSkill, Skill, Project, ProjectCollaborator, Tribe, TribeMember, TribeOpenRole, FeedEvent, and all enums.
acceptance_criteria:
- `app/models/__init__.py` imports all models
- All models and enums re-exported via __all__
- Alembic can discover all models via this import
